beans.description:
This (contrived) adaptor does the following...
* reads lines from stdin * delays for 1000ms * writes to stdout
Run with: java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config delayscript.xml
Initialise classpath with the following:
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar
Once it is running it will wait for command line input
type something like this...
hello
it should then delay for a second, and output the same data.
hello
